oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Colonel John M. Richmond inspects State Guard company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Col. John M. Richmond conducting a rifle inspection. Included in the photograph are six members of the Tennessee State Guard.

Army Colonel John M. Richmond, stationed at Camp Forrest, is shown in a rifle inspection of Company B, which was under the command of Captain H. Clay Matthews. While in Nashville, Colonel Richmond inspected several other companies and battalions.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1947
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Militia; Tennessee - History, Military; World War, 1939-1945
Military officers; Military uniforms; Rifles; Militias; Military inspections
